00061 #define B_UVEDIT_VERTEX     3
00062 
00063 /* UV Utilities */
00064 
00065 static int uvedit_center(Scene *scene, BMEditMesh *em, Image *ima, float center[2])
00066 {
00067     BMFace *f;
00068     BMLoop *l;
00069     BMIter iter, liter;
00070     MTexPoly *tf;
00071     MLoopUV *luv;
00072     int tot = 0.0;
00073     
00074     zero_v2(center);
00075     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00076         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00077         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, f, tf))
00078             continue;
00079 
00080         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00081             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00082             if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
00083                 add_v2_v2(center, luv->uv);
00084                 tot++;
00085             }
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00089     if (tot > 0) {
00090         center[0] /= tot;
00091         center[1] /= tot;
00092     }
00093 
00094     return tot;
00095 }
00096 
00097 static void uvedit_translate(Scene *scene, BMEditMesh *em, Image *UNUSED(ima), float delta[2])
00098 {
00099     BMFace *f;
00100     BMLoop *l;
00101     BMIter iter, liter;
00102     MLoopUV *luv;
00103     
00104     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00105         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00106             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00107             if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
00108                 add_v2_v2(luv->uv, delta);
00109             }
00110         }
00111     }
00112 }
00113 
00114 /* Button Functions, using an evil static variable */
00115 
00116 static float uvedit_old_center[2];
00117 
00118 static void uvedit_vertex_buttons(const bContext *C, uiBlock *block)
00119 {
00120     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
00121     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00122     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00123     Image *ima = sima->image;
00124     BMEditMesh *em;
00125     float center[2];
00126     int imx, imy, step, digits;
00127 
00128     ED_space_image_size(sima, &imx, &imy);
00129     
00130     em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00131 
00132     if (uvedit_center(scene, em, ima, center)) {
00133         copy_v2_v2(uvedit_old_center, center);
00134 
00135         if (!(sima->flag & SI_COORDFLOATS)) {
00136             uvedit_old_center[0] *= imx;
00137             uvedit_old_center[1] *= imy;
00138         }
00139 
00140         if (sima->flag & SI_COORDFLOATS) {
00141             step = 1;
00142             digits = 3;
00143         }
00144         else {
00145             step = 100;
00146             digits = 2;
00147         }
00148         
00149         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00150         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_UVEDIT_VERTEX, "X:",    10, 10, 145, 19, &uvedit_old_center[0], -10 * imx, 10.0 * imx, step, digits, "");
00151         uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_UVEDIT_VERTEX, "Y:",    165, 10, 145, 19, &uvedit_old_center[1], -10 * imy, 10.0 * imy, step, digits, "");
00152         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00156 static void do_uvedit_vertex(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg), int event)
00157 {
00158     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
00159     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00160     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00161     Image *ima = sima->image;
00162     BMEditMesh *em;
00163     float center[2], delta[2];
00164     int imx, imy;
00165 
00166     if (event != B_UVEDIT_VERTEX)
00167         return;
00168 
00169     em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00170 
00171     ED_space_image_size(sima, &imx, &imy);
00172     uvedit_center(scene, em, ima, center);
00173 
00174     if (sima->flag & SI_COORDFLOATS) {
00175         delta[0] = uvedit_old_center[0] - center[0];
00176         delta[1] = uvedit_old_center[1] - center[1];
00177     }
00178     else {
00179         delta[0] = uvedit_old_center[0] / imx - center[0];
00180         delta[1] = uvedit_old_center[1] / imy - center[1];
00181     }
00182 
00183     uvedit_translate(scene, em, ima, delta);
00184 
00185     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_IMAGE, sima->image);
00186 }
00187 
00188 /* Panels */
00189 
00190 static int image_panel_uv_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00191 {
00192     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00193     return ED_uvedit_test(obedit);
00194 }
00195 
00196 static void image_panel_uv(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00197 {
00198     uiBlock *block;
00199     
00200     block = uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(pa->layout);
00201     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_uvedit_vertex, NULL);
00202 
00203     uvedit_vertex_buttons(C, block);
00204 }   
00205 
00206 void ED_uvedit_buttons_register(ARegionType *art)
00207 {
00208     PanelType *pt;
00209 
00210     pt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype image panel uv");
00211     strcpy(pt->idname, "IMAGE_PT_uv");
00212     strcpy(pt->label, "UV Vertex");
00213     pt->draw = image_panel_uv;
00214     pt->poll = image_panel_uv_poll;
00215     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00216 }
